item.name: Wallet
Create Wallet
item.description: To create a wallet it is mandatory to pass in type of wallet in JSON. All wallet type creation will be on same end point.

item.name: Wallet Retrivel

request.description: Retrieve all wallets in the user account in brief detail.

response.name: Retrieve All Wallets

request.description: Use of single wallet retrievel end point is to get all information about a particular wallet.

item.description: Retrivel can be done in two ways /all or /single one. To retrive a single wallet we have to pass in the particular wallet id. The single wallet API gives more information and also includes all income transaction of the account.

item.name: Update Wallet

response.name: Update Other Account

item.description: Update to any type of wallet can be made through a single end point with specifying the wallet type in body JSON.
Wallet is the super type of all money accounts which includes Bank account, Credit Card etc.,

request.description: Page and Size in query param is mandatory to process the request
